item.title: Silver Crest Acquisition Corp 10-K
item.description: Silver Crest Acquisition Corp, which is in the Blank Checks [6770] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 30, 2022 had 34264 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: business - 838 instances combination - 621 instances may - 535 instances shares - 506 instances company - 465 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
